Description.Text:
Property Location
Tourist Hotel is in the heart of Kiev, walking distance from International Exhibition Center and Kiev Academic Theatre of Drama and Comedy. This hotel is within close proximity of Rusanivska Quay Park and Peremoha Park.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 332 guestrooms featuring refrigerators. Complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and cable programming is available for your entertainment. Bathrooms have complimentary toiletries and hair dryers. Conveniences include phones, as well as desks and blackout drapes/curtains.

Amenities
Pamper yourself with onsite massages or take in the view from a terrace. This hotel also features complimentary wireless Internet access, gift shops/newsstands, and a hair salon.

Dining
Grab a bite to eat at the hotel's restaurant, which serves breakfast and dinner, or grab a snack at one of the 2 coffee shops/cafés. Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include a business center, dry cleaning/laundry services, and a 24-hour front desk. Event facilities at this hotel consist of conference space and meeting rooms. For a surcharge, guests may use a roundtrip airport shuttle (available 24 hours) and a train station pick-up service.


Pets allowed Check-out time is noon
Grab a bite to eat at the hotel's restaurant, which serves breakfast and dinner, or grab a snack at one of the 2 coffee shops/cafés. Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on property policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

Pamper yourself with onsite massages or take in the view from a terrace. This hotel also features complimentary wireless Internet access, gift shops/newsstands, and a hair salon.
Make yourself at home in one of the 332 guestrooms featuring refrigerators. Complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and cable programming is available for your entertainment. Bathrooms have complimentary toiletries and hair dryers. Conveniences include phones, as well as desks and blackout drapes/curtains.

Tourist Hotel is in the heart of Kiev, walking distance from International Exhibition Center and Kiev Academic Theatre of Drama and Comedy. This hotel is within close proximity of Rusanivska Quay Park and Peremoha Park.
Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Kiev Academic Theatre of Drama and Comedy - 0.7 km / 0.4 mi
Rusanivska Quay Park - 1.2 km / 0.8 mi
International Exhibition Center - 1.3 km / 0.8 mi
Peremoha Park - 1.8 km / 1.1 mi
Recycled Materials Museum - 2.4 km / 1.5 mi
Hydropark - 2.8 km / 1.7 mi
Kyoto Park - 3.6 km / 2.3 mi
Kyiv Founders’ Monument - 4.7 km / 2.9 mi
The Ukrainian State Museum of the Great Patriotic War - 5.3 km / 3.3 mi
The Motherland Monument - 5.4 km / 3.4 mi
Mother Motherland Statue - 5.7 km / 3.5 mi
St.Theodosius Pechersky Monastery - 5.9 km / 3.7 mi
Mykola Syadristy Microminiatures Museum - 6 km / 3.8 mi
Kiev Monastery of the Caves - 6 km / 3.8 mi
National Historic Library of Ukraine - 6 km / 3.8 mi

The nearest airports are:
Kiev (IEV-Zhulhany) - 15.6 km / 9.7 mi
Kiev (KBP-Borispol Intl.) - 31.5 km / 19.5 mi

The preferred airport for Tourist Hotel is Kiev (KBP-Borispol Intl.).

Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on property policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

Message.Text:
Essential Information: Room 1
Hotel Tariff Notes: No show and early departure will be subjected to 100% charge. No date, name and room changed allowed. Bookings including children will be based on sharing parents bedding, no separate bed for children is provided unless otherwise stated. IMPORTANT INFO. Due to changes in Tax codex of Ukraine starting from 01 January 2019 tourism tax and conditions of its applicability are changed. The amount of tourism fee will be charged upon check-in from client directly. Fee amount applies per person per day is 16,69 UAH (approximately 0.60 USD or 0.55 EUR) for citizens of Ukraine and 41,73 UAH (approximately 1.55 USD or 1.40 EUR) for citizens other countries.
